name: FEW
description: This unusual story took place in one of the Forests, of which there are many. An old, evil witch, having settled in it, quietly began to pollute the nearest territories, but that was not the end. After a few months, the animals noticed that their beloved home began to turn into a den of real horror. The vile Witch caused complete chaos in the peaceful existence of the forest, violating all its laws and establishing their own orders. Our brave hero is the one who first understood that if this continues, then their house will come to an end, made an incredibly difficult decision for an ordinary Raccoon - having accumulated anger on the old corga, he began his path of justice: "Since this bitch has caused chaos in our Forest, then I will wreak havoc on her in her damned house " - and with these words on fur coats, he set off to find the witch and punish her. As soon as he entered the house, he immediately spotted the magic wand, and she noticed him. It would seem that now there will be no difficulties, after all, magic is in his hands, but he could not imagine what could await him in the damned mansion...
